item.description:
This is the 21st year of Eddie Andelman's Hot Dog Safari to Benefit the Joey Fund and Cystic Fibrosis. It will be bigger and better this year as Eddie has partnered with the Phantom Gourmet to produce this event.

The Hot Dog Safari is an entire day of food and fun, featuring dozens of kinds of hot dogs, other foods, drinks and activities.

Tickets are just $15.00 in advance. Kids aged 6 and under are admitted free. Ticket includes food and drinks. No refunds.

Expect 30,000 guests, sports fans, families and kids attending from Noon - 5 pm. The event takes place both inside and outside Suffolk Downs. Parking is free and T access is by the Blue Line.

For more information on the Hot Dog Safari and to purchase tickets go to the following web sites:

www.hotdogsafari.com

www.phantomgourmet.com



l
item.name: Eddie Andelman's 21st Annual Hot Dog Safari at Suffolk Downs
